/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding to the urban charm of the scene. Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the cityscape.
